name.fr: Boîte de Parchemins de Fusion A
name.jp: 製錬スクロールパッケージA

description.en: A package containing 5x Scroll of SProtect, 4x Scroll of GProtect, 8x Scroll of AProtect and 4x Scroll of Weapon Bonus. All items are also linked.
description.ar: A package containing 5x Scroll of SProtect, 4x Scroll of GProtect, 8x Scroll of AProtect and 4x Scroll of Weapon Bonus. All items are also linked.
description.br: Ao abrir este pacote você receberá os seguintes itens: (5x) Pergaminho de Proteção S, (4x) Pergaminho de Proteção G, (8x) Pergaminho de Proteção A e (4x) Pergaminho do Bônus de Arma. Todos os itens são ligados à alma.

description.de: Ein Paket, das 5x Scroll of SProtect, 4x Scroll of GProtect, 8x Scroll of AProtect und 4x Scroll of Weapon Bonus enthält. Alle Items sind seelengebunden.

description.fr: Paquet qui contient 5 Parchemins Sprotect, 4 Parchemins Gprotect, 8 Parchemins Aprotect et 4 Parchemins de Bonus d'Arme. Tous les objets sont liés.
description.id: Sebuah paket berisi 5x Scroll SProtect, 4x Scroll GProtect, 8x Scroll AProtect dan 4x Scroll Bonus Senjata. Semua item juga terhubung.
description.it: A package containing 5x Scroll of SProtect, 4x Scroll of GProtect, 8x Scroll of AProtect and 4x Scroll of Weapon Bonus. All items are also linked.
description.jp: 鍛冶屋の心得・精錬編x5、鍛冶屋の心得・ソケット作成編x4、鍛冶屋の心得・アクセサリー編x8と武器ボーナスの巻物x4が含まれたパッケージ。すべてのアイテムはリンクされています。

description.th: แพ็คเกจนี้มี Scroll of SProtect 5 ชิ้น, Scroll of GProtect 4 ชิ้น, Scroll of AProtect 8 ชิ้น และ Scroll of Weapon Bonus 4 ชิ้น ไอเทมทั้งหมดผูกมัด
description.tw: 包含 5x 精鍊防爆卷軸、4x 穿洞防爆卷軸、8x 飾品防爆卷軸和 4x 武器增幅卷軸卷軸的禮包，所有道具都是被鏈接歸屬。
